title: Hybrid Deep Learning-Based Skin Lesion Classification and Diagnostic Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of digital image processing concepts
context.additional_context: Practical skills-focused training for learners preparing for employment in medical AI fields

learning_goals: Learners can classify at least three major types of skin lesions and describe their clinical characteristics
Learners can explain the basic structure of the ResUNet + ACO model and its application to skin lesion classification
Learners can evaluate model performance using medical image analysis metrics such as the Dice coefficient and Jaccard index
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
